'''Seats Sacred and Secular''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. This card can only be created by [[Furina (Character Card)|Furina]] and cannot be included in the deck otherwise.

==Gameplay Notes==
*This card cannot be played if the player's Furina is defeated. Consequently, Salon Members or Singer of Many Waters cannot change their state.
